verbose_text: Interestingly, Claussnitzer et al XREF_BIBR showed that the rs1421085 T-to-C variant of FTO influences expression of the nearby genes IRX3 and IRX5, which repress mitochondrial thermogenesis in adipocyte precursor cells, resulting in a shift from energy dissipating beige adipocytes to energy storing white adipocytes.
evidence: expression of the nearby genes IRX3 and IRX5
